snippet: New York’s attorney general, under the aegis of a federal mortgage task force, filed a civil suit against Bear Stearns, now part of JPMorgan Chase, asserting that it defrauded investors who purchased mortgage securities.
abstract: New York State Attorney General Eric T Schneiderman, under aegis of federal mortgage task force, files a civil suit against Bear Stearns, now part of JPMorgan Chase, asserting that it defrauded investors who purchased mortgage securities from 2005 through 2007.
lead_paragraph: New York’s attorney general, under the aegis of a federal mortgage task force, filed a civil suit against Bear Stearns, now part of JPMorgan Chase, asserting that it defrauded investors who purchased mortgage securities.

headline.seo: JPMorgan Unit Is Sued Over Mortgage Securities
